description.en: Create advanced, state-aware logic units with multiple formulas.
description.nb: Lag avanserte, tilstandsbevisste logiske enheter med flere formler.

hint.en:
JSON array. Operators: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Examples:
[{"id":"f1","name":"A AND B","expression":"A AND B","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"A * B","expression":"A * B","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"A + B","expression":"A + B","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"A XOR B","expression":"A ^ B","enabled":true},{"id":"f5","name":"NOT A","expression":"!A","enabled":true}]
hint.nb:
JSON-array. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Eksempler:
[{"id":"f1","name":"A AND B","expression":"A AND B","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"A * B","expression":"A * B","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"A + B","expression":"A + B","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"A XOR B","expression":"A ^ B","enabled":true},{"id":"f5","name":"NOT A","expression":"!A","enabled":true}]

hint.en:
JSON array. Operators: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Examples:
[{"id":"f1","name":"A AND B AND C","expression":"A AND B AND C","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"(A+B)*C","expression":"(A+B)*C","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"A XOR B XOR C","expression":"A^B^C","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"!A | B & C","expression":"!A | B & C","enabled":true}]
hint.nb:
JSON-array. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Eksempler:
[{"id":"f1","name":"A AND B AND C","expression":"A AND B AND C","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"(A+B)*C","expression":"(A+B)*C","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"A XOR B XOR C","expression":"A^B^C","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"!A | B & C","expression":"!A | B & C","enabled":true}]

hint.en:
JSON array. Operators: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Examples:
[{"id":"f1","name":"A AND B XOR C","expression":"A AND B XOR C","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"(A+B)*(C+D)","expression":"(A+B)*(C+D)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"A XOR (B&C&D)","expression":"A^(B&C&D)","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"!(A|B) & (C!=D)","expression":"!(A|B) & (C!=D)","enabled":true}]
hint.nb:
JSON-array. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Eksempler:
[{"id":"f1","name":"A AND B XOR C","expression":"A AND B XOR C","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"(A+B)*(C+D)","expression":"(A+B)*(C+D)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"A XOR (B&C&D)","expression":"A^(B&C&D)","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"!(A|B) & (C!=D)","expression":"!(A|B) & (C!=D)","enabled":true}]

hint.en:
JSON array. Operators: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Examples:
[{"id":"f1","name":"All inputs active","expression":"A AND B AND C AND D AND E","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"(A+B)*(C+D)*E","expression":"(A+B)*(C+D)*E","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"Complex XOR","expression":"(A^B) AND (C^D^E)","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Mixed operators","expression":"!A | (B&C) XOR (D+E)","enabled":true}]
hint.nb:
JSON-array. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Eksempler:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Alle innganger aktive","expression":"A AND B AND C AND D AND E","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"(A+B)*(C+D)*E","expression":"(A+B)*(C+D)*E","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"Kompleks XOR","expression":"(A^B) AND (C^D^E)","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Blandede operatorer","expression":"!A | (B&C) XOR (D+E)","enabled":true}]

hint.en:
JSON array. Operators: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Examples:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Majority vote","expression":"(A&B)|(B&C)|(A&C)|(A&B&C&D&E&F)","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"Three groups","expression":"(A+B)*(C+D)*(E+F)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"Parity check","expression":"A^B^C^D^E^F","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Advanced logic","expression":"!(A|B) & (C XOR D) | (E&F)","enabled":true}]
hint.nb:
JSON-array. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Eksempler:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Flertallsstemme","expression":"(A&B)|(B&C)|(A&C)|(A&B&C&D&E&F)","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"Tre grupper","expression":"(A+B)*(C+D)*(E+F)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"Paritetssjekk","expression":"A^B^C^D^E^F","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Avansert logikk","expression":"!(A|B) & (C XOR D) | (E&F)","enabled":true}]

hint.en:
JSON array. Operators: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Examples:
[{"id":"f1","name":"All or nothing","expression":"(A&B&C&D&E&F&G) | !(A|B|C|D|E|F|G)","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"Grouped logic","expression":"(A+B+C) * (D+E) * (F+G)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"Sequential XOR","expression":"A^B^C^D^E^F^G","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Priority system","expression":"A | (!A&B) | (!A&!B&C) | (D&E&F&G)","enabled":true}]
hint.nb:
JSON-array. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Eksempler:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Alt eller ingenting","expression":"(A&B&C&D&E&F&G) | !(A|B|C|D|E|F|G)","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"Grupperte logikk","expression":"(A+B+C) * (D+E) * (F+G)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"Sekvensiell XOR","expression":"A^B^C^D^E^F^G","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Prioritetssystem","expression":"A | (!A&B) | (!A&!B&C) | (D&E&F&G)","enabled":true}]

hint.en:
JSON array. Operators: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Examples:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Complex cascade","expression":"(A&B) | (C&D&E) | (F&G&H)","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"Four pairs","expression":"(A+B)*(C+D)*(E+F)*(G+H)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"Even parity","expression":"A^B^C^D^E^F^G^H","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Conditional chain","expression":"(A&B&C) XOR (D&E) | !(F|G|H)","enabled":true}]
hint.nb:
JSON-array. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Eksempler:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Kompleks kaskade","expression":"(A&B) | (C&D&E) | (F&G&H)","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"Fire par","expression":"(A+B)*(C+D)*(E+F)*(G+H)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"Jevn paritet","expression":"A^B^C^D^E^F^G^H","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Betinget kjede","expression":"(A&B&C) XOR (D&E) | !(F|G|H)","enabled":true}]

hint.en:
JSON array. Operators: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Examples:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Majority 5 of 9","expression":"((A&B&C&D&E)|(A&B&C&F&G)|(D&E&H&I))","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"Three trios","expression":"(A+B+C)*(D+E+F)*(G+H+I)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"XOR chain 9","expression":"A^B^C^D^E^F^G^H^I","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Nested conditions","expression":"(A|(B&C)) XOR (D&(E|F|G)) & !(H^I)","enabled":true}]
hint.nb:
JSON-array. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Eksempler:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Flertall 5 av 9","expression":"((A&B&C&D&E)|(A&B&C&F&G)|(D&E&H&I))","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"Tre trioer","expression":"(A+B+C)*(D+E+F)*(G+H+I)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"XOR-kjede 9","expression":"A^B^C^D^E^F^G^H^I","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Nestede betingelser","expression":"(A|(B&C)) XOR (D&(E|F|G)) & !(H^I)","enabled":true}]

hint.en:
JSON array. Operators: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Examples:
[{"id":"f1","name":"All 10 inputs","expression":"A&B&C&D&E&F&G&H&I&J","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"Five pairs OR","expression":"(A+B)*(C+D)*(E+F)*(G+H)*(I+J)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"Full XOR parity","expression":"A^B^C^D^E^F^G^H^I^J","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Complex weighted","expression":"(A&B&C) | (D&E&F&G) | (H&I&J) XOR !(A|J)","enabled":true}]
hint.nb:
JSON-array. Operatorer: AND(*,&), OR(+,|), XOR(^,!=), NOT(!). Eksempler:
[{"id":"f1","name":"Alle 10 innganger","expression":"A&B&C&D&E&F&G&H&I&J","enabled":true},{"id":"f2","name":"Fem par OR","expression":"(A+B)*(C+D)*(E+F)*(G+H)*(I+J)","enabled":true},{"id":"f3","name":"Full XOR-paritet","expression":"A^B^C^D^E^F^G^H^I^J","enabled":true},{"id":"f4","name":"Kompleks vektet","expression":"(A&B&C) | (D&E&F&G) | (H&I&J) XOR !(A|J)","enabled":true}]
